text: Xibeiwang Station () is a station on the Line 16 of the Beijing Subway. It opened in December 2016. == Station layout == {|cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=100|G |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=100|Entrances and Exits |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;" width=350|Exits A-C |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|M |style="border- top:solid 1px gray;"|Mezzanine |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|Mezzanine of Exit C |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|B1 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|Concourse |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|Faregates, Station Agent |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;border-top:solid 1px gray;" rowspan=3|B2 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|Northbound |style="border- top:solid 1px gray;"|← towards Beianhe (Yongfeng South) |- |style="border- top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;text-align:center;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors open on the left |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Southbound |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"| towards Xiyuan (Malianwa) → |} == Exits == {| class="wikitable" !rowspan=4 style="background:#"| !scope="col" style="width:100px;"|Exit !Destination !Image |- |30px5px20px5px |Yongfeng Rd. |150px |- |30px5px20px5px 30px |Yongfeng Rd., Haidian District Comprehensive Emergency Rescue Command Center |150px |- |30px5px20px5px |Houchangcun Rd., Administrative Office Hall of Xibeiwang Town, Malianwa Police Station |150px |} ==Transport connections== ===Rail=== Schedule as of December 2016: {| style="text-align:centre; font- size:95%; border:1px solid black" |- !
